channel.title: Agriculture on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Agriculture on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: MAHA Wants Action on Pesticides. It’s Not Going to Get It From Trump’s Corporate-Friendly EPA
item.description: The White House’s new Make America Healthy Again strategy makes some asks of the EPA—but critics say the agency is too industry-friendly to make a difference.

item.title: MAHA Wants Action on Pesticides. It’s Not Going to Get It From Trump’s Corporate-Friendly EPA
item.description: The White House’s new Make America Healthy Again strategy makes some asks of the EPA—but critics say the agency is too industry-friendly to make a difference.

item.title: In the Southwest, solar panels can help both photovoltaics and crops
item.description: Solar arrays can shade crops from sun while moisture cools the panels to increase their productivity.

item.title: In the Southwest, solar panels in can help both photovoltaics and crops
